commit.title: [Fail] Simplify `Fail` implementation.
commit.message:
[Fail] Simplify `Fail` implementation.

We still have to mess with the imperative state in order to print the
message right.

Note that we mostly remove the solution implemented in
ea3909466eaaf86ff212c0a002e5df11e4a979f5 , the `CErrors.noncritical e`
guard should enough to ensure anomalies are not catched by `Fail`.

Instead, we place the check for unhandled exceptions in the
`is_anomaly` check and consider all of those anomalies directly.

ea3909466eaaf86ff212c0a002e5df11e4a979f5 , the `CErrors.noncritical e`
guard should enough to ensure anomalies are not catched by `Fail`.

Instead, we place the check for unhandled exceptions in the
`is_anomaly` check and consider all of those anomalies directly.

[Fail] Simplify `Fail` implementation.

We still have to mess with the imperative state in order to print the
message right.

Note that we mostly remove the solution implemented in
ea3909466eaaf86ff212c0a002e5df11e4a979f5 , the `CErrors.noncritical e`
guard should enough to ensure anomalies are not catched by `Fail`.

Instead, we place the check for unhandled exceptions in the
`is_anomaly` check and consider all of those anomalies directly.
